title: Temporary Work (Short Stay Specialist) visa
summary: This page provides detailed information about the Temporary Work (Short Stay Specialist) visa, Subclass 400. It outlines who is eligible, how long the visa allows you to stay, costs, requirements, obligations, and work limitations. It also explains application steps, entry rules, and conditions for including family members.

structured_data.description: A temporary visa that allows short-term, highly specialised, non-ongoing work in Australia when the required skills are not reasonably available in Australia.

stay_information.requirement_for_over_3_months: strong business case must be provided
stay_information.must_arrive_within: 6 months of visa grant date or shorter period specified by the Minister

visa_entry_types.single_entry: Holder may enter Australia once; must apply for a new visa to return.
visa_entry_types.multiple_entry: Holder may re-enter multiple times but stay period does not restart.

exceptions: Applicants coming to Australia as a representative of a foreign government listed in a legislative instrument
additional_costs: Charges for each family member applying
costs.pricing_tool: Visa Pricing Estimator (does not include additional costs)

processing_times.processing_time_guide: Use visa processing time guide tool for recent decision times. Not specific to individual cases.

conditions: Work must match the purpose for which the visa was granted
not_allowed_work: perform as an entertainer in Australia
support an entertainer or group performing in Australia
direct or produce work for entertainment shown in Australia (unless meeting exemptions)
allowed_entertainment_activities_with_co: directing, producing, or roles in a production not shown in Australia (requires distribution contract or evidence)
promotional activities (e.g., actor at premiere, band on promotional tour with no performances)

must_have: skills, knowledge or experience that can assist Australian business
skills not reasonably available in the Australian labour market
work that is non-ongoing (completed within 6 months or less)
evidence_examples: letter from overseas employer explaining position and duties
highly_specialised_skills_requirement.employer_requirements: Australian business or overseas employer may need to show they attempted to hire Australians first

requirements_for_family: not permitted to work or study (except language training)
family_members.financial_requirements: Applicant must show enough means to support themselves and family

health_insurance.recommendation: Take out health insurance for unforeseen medical treatment
health_insurance.personal_liability: You are responsible for all healthcare costs in Australia
health_insurance.reciprocal_healthcare_agreements: Some countries have agreements; see Services Australia

travel.first_entry_requirement: Must enter within 6 months of visa grant unless a shorter period specified
